text:
This Larabar tastes just like a cinnamon roll!!! I don't know how those Larabar people do it, but whatever the flavor of Larabar it is, it tastes just like the real thing!!! This particular Larabar is cinnamon roll, therefore, it goes good with a cup of coffee. And in this cold weather lately, good hot coffee has been welcome!!! I've been having my share lately of good hot coffee and Larabars!!! And if you like cinnamon rolls, I'm sure you would love this particular Larabar.

And for hot weather, or for the flavors of Larabars that go better with cold beverages, cold iced tea works very well also with Larabars.

Oh, and I need to tell you, Larabars are natural - no added sugar, only natural sugar from fruits. There are no bad ingredients. There is also no soy. Larabars are healthy, convenient, filling, perfect. And vegan. And even if you aren't vegan, you can still eat Larabars because they are so good. They are so good, you forget that they are made from healthy ingredients.

Cinnamon Roll Larabar. Highly Recommended.
